t: Why Facebook, Google And Amazon Are Embracing Media Mix Modeling | AdExchanger
s: September 12, 2023 - MMM is typically conducted by the brands themselves, which use statistical models to analyze their sales and media spend data. But measurement has been so hampered by recently enacted privacy restrictions that Meta, Google and Amazon are finding that any measurement tool is better than not ...

t: Receive more granular MMM signals from Amazon | Amazon Ads
s: April 15, 2024 - We have enhanced the marketing mix modeling feed by launching support for daily-grain metrics. Now, advertisers and their supporting MMM partners can receive MMM signals that are directly comparable to other publishers, regardless of their aggregation frequencies.

t: Automated report setup in Marketing Mix Models (MMM) application | Amazon Ads
s: November 15, 2022 - We are simplifying our Marketing Mix Models (MMM) feed by automating and including brand, product, and campaign selection within the advertising console. After selecting an advertiser, users will leverage a dropdown menu to select a brand.

t: Improve the reliability of marketing mix models with Amazon’s MMM | Amazon Ads
s: March 31, 2024 - Amazon’s MMM insights are now available in the United Arab Emirates and the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

t: WARC & Amazon Ads release report on the benefits of MMM
s: July 13, 2023 - WARC in collaboration with Amazon Ads have released a new report titled Next wave measurement: Marketing mix modelling in the age of retail media. The report demonstrates the benefits of Marketing Mix Modelling (MMM) in a world where retail media influence continues to expand and highlights the advances being made in support of greater industry adoption.  · The key insights outlined in the new report include:  · • Consumers use 20+ channels to interact with brands...
